verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
SING HALLELUJAH TO THE LORD,
(Men)
Sing Hallelujah to the Lord, (Women)
Sing Hallelujah to the Lord, (Men)
Sing Hallelujah, (Women)
Sing Hallelujah, sing Hallelujah, (All)
Sing Hallelujah to the Lord. (All)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus is risen from the dead …

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus is Lord of heaven and earth …

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jesus is living in His church …

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Jesus is coming for His own …
